title: Strengthen Booking Policy/Terms legal text, refund/privacy clauses, update footer links, and verify backend verification/timeout workflows

requirements.text: Update the existing Booking Policy & Terms page content to include stronger legal protection and clarity, including (a) the exact platform disclaimer text provided by the user, (b) the exact dispute/liability clause provided by the user, (c) an updated ₹99 unlock fee refund policy presented in bullet format with exactly the listed refund-eligible conditions and a clear statement that the unlock fee is non-refundable in all other cases, and (d) a data privacy statement covering contact sharing only after successful unlock and no third-party sharing without consent except where required by law. All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes:
Please update the Booking Policy & Terms section with stronger legal protection and clarity.
Add this disclaimer clearly:
STYO is a digital listing platform and not a real estate broker, agent, or property manager. STYO does not guarantee property condition, legality, availability, pricing accuracy, or transaction completion. All agreements and transactions are solely between the property owner and the seeker.
Add dispute clause:
Any disputes, damages, fraud, misrepresentation, or conflicts arising after contact unlock shall be solely between the property owner and the seeker. STYO shall not be liable for such disputes.
Update refund policy for ₹99 unlock fee clearly in bullet format:
Refund applicable only if:
Property owner is unreachable within 48 hours
Listing is proven fake after admin verification
Duplicate unlock payment due to system error
Unlock fee is non-refundable in all other cases.
Add data privacy statement:
User contact details are shared only after successful unlock payment. STYO does not sell or share personal data with third parties without user consent, except where required by law.

acceptanceCriteria: BookingPolicyPage includes the exact disclaimer text and the exact dispute clause text as provided by the user (verbatim).

The ₹99 unlock fee refund policy is shown as a bullet list and includes only the three refund-eligible conditions specified by the user, plus a clear statement that all other cases are non-refundable.

A data privacy statement is present and explicitly states: contact details are shared only after successful unlock payment; STYO does not sell/share personal data with third parties without consent; exception for legal requirements.
All text added/updated for these sections is in English.

requirements.text: Update the site footer to include and visibly display proper links exactly labeled: "Privacy Policy" | "Terms & Conditions" | "Refund Policy" | "Contact Email". Ensure each item navigates to an appropriate route/page (for the three policies) and opens an email link for Contact Email.

quotes:
Ensure footer contains proper links:
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Refund Policy | Contact Email

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays four items with the exact labels: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund Policy, Contact Email.
Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy each navigate to a dedicated frontend route/page.
Contact Email is a mailto link (e.g., mailto:support@styo.in) and is clickable from the footer.

requirements.text: Add dedicated frontend pages/routes for Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy (English text). Ensure these pages include the same updated legal positions requested by the user where relevant (platform disclaimer, dispute clause post-unlock, refund eligibility bullets for ₹99 unlock fee, and the data privacy statement) without contradicting the Booking Policy & Terms page.

quotes: Update refund policy for ₹99 unlock fee clearly in bullet format: ...
Ensure footer contains proper links: Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Refund Policy | Contact Email

acceptanceCriteria: Routes exist for Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy and are reachable via the footer links.
Refund Policy page presents the ₹99 unlock fee refund eligibility in bullets exactly as specified by the user.
Privacy Policy page includes the requested data privacy statement as specified by the user.
Terms & Conditions page includes the requested platform disclaimer and the requested dispute clause as specified by the user.

requirements.text: Verify and, if missing or incomplete, implement the backend admin verification workflow for listings (including public submissions) and the 24-hour under-confirmation timeout logic. Specifically: ensure (a) an admin-only workflow exists to review/approve/reject submitted listings, (b) listing approvalStatus is enforced consistently for actions that require an approved listing, and (c) listings in propertyStatus #underConfirmation automatically revert to #available after 24 hours (system-driven).

quotes: Also confirm that admin verification workflow and 24-hour under-confirmation timeout logic are properly implemented on backend.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides an admin-only mechanism to review pending submissions and approve or reject them, resulting in a persisted approvalStatus change on the affected listing/submission.
Backend enforces that actions requiring an approved listing reject non-approved listings (e.g., unlockListing must fail when approvalStatus is not #approved).
A system-driven process exists that reverts listings from #underConfirmation to #available after 24 hours (based on statusTimestamp) without requiring a manual admin/user action.

Frontend hook useProcessExpiredListings can call a corresponding backend method without errors (method exists and is callable), or the backend provides an equivalent mechanism that keeps the state correct.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister; place all logic in backend/main.mo (only add backend/migration.mo if an actual stable-state migration is required).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for all user-facing text added/changed in the UI.
nonGoals: Implementing real payment processing or Stripe-based refunds for the ₹99 unlock fee.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Introducing external databases or additional backend services.
